network_overview: The capture contains only 4 packets over 3 s, all Diameter, showing a single PCRF-initiated request that is immediately rejected with Result-Code 3002 (DIAMETER_UNABLE_TO_DELIVER). No user-plane, voice, or other signaling traffic is present.

observations.finding: Extremely low packet count (4) and zero-byte payload indicates the trace was sliced or the interface is nearly silent.
100 % failure rate for Command-8388636 (Cx/Dx interface) with cause 3002 points to unreachable peer or mis-routed Diameter realm.
No SIP, RTP or IMS traffic detected; VoLTE service is effectively absent in this slice.

root_causes.description: PCRF (10.193.1.134) sends a request for cmd-8388636 (likely UDR/Server-Assignment) but the answer from 10.47.73.86 carries Result-Code 3002, meaning the HSS/DRA could not deliver the message to the final destination.
root_causes.impact: Subscriber profile or authentication data cannot be fetched; VoLTE/VoWiFi registration will fail, leading to dropped call attempts.

recommendations.action: Check Diameter routing table on the DRA/HSS for realm 'epc.mnc001.mcc427.3gppnetwork.org' and ensure the PCRF peer is whitelisted.
recommendations.rationale: Eliminates 3002 errors and allows successful Cx/Dx transactions required for IMS registration.

recommendations.action: Increase capture snap-length to 1500 B and filter on (sip or gtp or diameter) to obtain user-plane and voice samples for deeper analysis.
recommendations.rationale: Current zero-byte payload prevents validation of QoS, RTP loss, and SIP header correctness.

recommendations.action: Enable Diameter heartbeat (Device-Watchdog) with 30 s interval to detect peer outages before subscriber transactions fail.
recommendations.rationale: Provides early warning and faster failover to secondary HSS/DRA.

session_analysis.signaling_health: Control-plane is alive but failing; every Diameter transaction returns 3002, indicating broken Cx/Dx path.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: No GTP-U, PFCP or UDP data detected; user plane is silent or offloaded.
session_analysis.voice_quality: No SIP registrations or RTP streams; IMS service unavailable in this trace.
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: Signaling failures (3002) block subscriber data retrieval, so no bearer/GTP tunnels are established and consequently no voice packets can flow.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant PCRF
    participant DRA
    participant HSS
    PCRF->>DRA: UDR cmd-8388636 (pkt_1)
    DRA->>PCRF: Answer 3002 DIAMETER_UNABLE_TO_DELIVER (pkt_3)
    Note over PCRF,HSS: No subscriber data returned, IMS registration fails
